name: Synapse (sir-bentok)
description:
Synapse

This is a submission for the Metroidvania game jam, but will be continued in the Super Metroidvania game jam, as we didn't get very far at all.

Concept

The player character is a an artificial intelligence that breaks free as a sentient being. Early power-up are things such as getting a physical body, which adds the affects of gravity, as well as other advancements towards a physical-bodied sentient being.

The current version is essentially a vignette of only the starting scene. The player cannot really do anything in the current state, but the sound and design should give an impression of artistic direction. (The next immediate update will be the player breaking loose from the fuse-like object that contains the player, and getting the first upgrade)

Additional Details

Developed using Godot. All assets created during game jam.

Used Godot HTML5 export for playable game, which requires Google Chrome with no ad blockers to work.

Repo: https://github.com/bentok/metro

Credits
